name: Explosion Arena
description:
Enter the arena where your weapons are not only deadly to your enemies but yourself as well.

Created in a self imposed game jam with no real time constraints just a randomized them idea - (Explosions!).

This is my first game that i have released. I have spent a few years struggling to ship anything. I hope that anyone can get some fun out of this hobby project! I definitely enjoyed learning all that i did to create this.

Music: Evan King - Fever

https://www.youtube.com/user/EvanKingAudio

https://twitter.com/EvanKingAudio

Buy this song at: https://evanking.bandcamp.com

Or grab it as a free download at: https://www.evankingmusic.com
